'''14w33b''' is the forty-seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 15, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140815000703/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w33a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w33c|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> which adds new food textures and fixes some bugs and crashes from [[14w33a]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:14w33b Textures.png|300px|thumbnail|The items which had their textures changed in this snapshot. (Note: the text grid item does not represent any item.)]]
'''[[Cooked mutton]], [[cooked rabbit]], [[rabbit's foot]], [[rabbit hide]], [[raw mutton]], [[raw rabbit]]'''
* Changed textures.

'''[[Door]]s'''
* Changed item textures to be more accurate and consistent.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w33b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|4490|Fishing rod not attached in 3rd person while crouching.
|;dev
|50321|Fishing line not connected to the rod in third person view.
|64456|Fishing rod bug in 3rd person.
|65112|Grass block shows a damage value of 0 when tooltips are enabled.
|65521|Armor stands consume whole stack of items in Survival.
|65533|Efficiency enchantment does not work on shovels and axes.
|;previous
|66970|Major texture disortion for redstone, stairs, cobblestone walls, fences and fence gates.
|66983|Game crashes when placing a torch or redstone torch on the bottom of a block.
|67141|<code>Hopper: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Name and ID cannot both be blank</code>.
|67142|<code>Hopper: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot set property ben{name{{=}}has_bottle_0, clazz{{=}}class java.lang.Boolean, values{{=}}[true, false]} as it does not exist</code>.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w33b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* Numerous textures from this update were made by the Reddit user [https://www.reddit.com/user/zeldahuman/ Zeldahuman].
